SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT boardSeq, writer, title, category, content, viewCount, regdate FROM board
OR writer LIKE '%' || #{writer} || '%'
OR title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
OR content LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%'
OR category LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%'
ORDER BY boardSeq DESC ) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT boardSeq, writer, title, category, content, viewCount, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD AM HH:MI') regdate, LAG(boardSeq, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY boardSeq DESC) as prevNum, LEAD(boardSeq, 1, 0) OVER(ORDER BY boardSeq DESC) as nextNum FROM board
OR writer LIKE '%' || #{writer} || '%'
OR title LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
OR content LIKE '%' || #{content} || '%'
OR category LIKE '%' || #{category} || '%'
ORDER BY boardSeq DESC) result1 WHERE boardSeq=#{boardSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardSeq, writer, title, category, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{category}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
